summary: In an abandoned asylum, doctors carry out secret experiments on unsuspecting patients. The experiments, codenamed Limes, are designed to cure violent episodes through new methods of brainwashing and mind manipulation.
cast: Adrian Voo|Bo Lennart Robert Linton|Athena Baumeister|Velta Moore|Jonathan Rosenthal|Christine Springett|Kathinka van Putten|Patrick Edward Wynne|Caroline Attwood|Omar Hansen|Michael Whitton|David Neff|Russell Barry|Marilyn Burns|Will Leon|Jeff Moore|Lorren Holliday|Josie Peng|Alain Ali Washnevsky|Steven Dunford|Kayla Speck|Teresa R. Parker|Galen Hutchison|Sukhvir Sohal|Armin Nasseri|Michael Campitiello|Bryan Geer|William Guirola|Bryan Sloyer|Derrick T. Tuggle|Devin Parent|Jordan Liebowitz|Flynn Nicholls|Mike Egbert|Christopher Zappia|Simone Gross|Eleanor King|Michelle Wei|Kimberly Sheree Mason|Camilla Elaine|Steve Rodriguez|Marcus Bradford|Brynn Sicard|Filip Maciejewicz|Abigail Hillary Jarrett
title: Seventy-Nine
